is.merkor.core
Class ItemDictionaryDB

java.lang.Object
  is.merkor.core.ItemDictionaryDB
All Implemented Interfaces:
ItemDictionary
public class ItemDictionaryDB
extends java.lang.Object
implements ItemDictionary

An implementation of the ItemDictionary interface using a Hibernate layer to connect to database representation of the MerkOr data.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Anna B. Nikulasdottir

getItemsFor

public java.util.List<LexicalItem> getItemsFor(java.lang.String lemma)
Returns a List of LexicalItems having lemma as lemma.

Specified by:
getItemsFor in interface ItemDictionary
Parameters:
lemma - the lemma to search LexicalItems for
Returns:
a List of LexicalItems having lemma as lemma or an empty List if nothing is found
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if param is null or empty

getItemsFor

public java.util.List<LexicalItem> getItemsFor(java.lang.String lemma,
                                               java.lang.String wordclass)
Returns a List of LexicalItems having lemma as lemma and wordclass as wordclass. wordclass has to match a field in Wordclass.

Specified by:
getItemsFor in interface ItemDictionary
Parameters:
lemma - the lemma to search LexicalItems for
wordclass - the wordlcass (part-of-speech) the LexicalItems must have.
Returns:
a List of LexicalItems having lemma as lemma and wordclass as wordclass, or an empty List if nothing is found
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if one param is null or empty, or if wordclass does not match valid wordclasses

getItemsMatching

public java.util.List<LexicalItem> getItemsMatching(java.lang.String regex)
Description copied from interface: ItemDictionary
Retrieve all s where attribute lemma matches regex.

Specified by:
getItemsMatching in interface ItemDictionary
Parameters:
regex - the regular expression to match against lemma
Returns:
a List of items having lemma matching regex, or empty List if no match is found
